name: Save Homeworld
description:
You control an orbital platform which protects your homeworld against ruthless aliens who try to turn it to ashes. Put the platform to the strokes of an enemy, pick up the upgrades for your platform, launched from the surface of the planet, turn your platform into unassailable fortress.
Destroy the enemies with different weapons, collect the articles and the bonuses, and above all – constantly protect the planet, because the game will end if the planet dies.Game features:
  • different types of weapon for destruction of the enemies
  • several types of enemies-from simple up to almost invulnerable
  • the dynamics keeps the player under the constant tension – the planet might die after any little mistake
  • A hardcore mode is available, too. But it is so tough that at first we wanted to remove it
  • The Steam tournament standings. Compete against other players to pass on ever further and to collect more points!
